section.p:
You are recognized as a member of the brotherhood and shown in.
If you have the codeword East, immediately.
If not, read on.
You must pay your membership fee of 5 Shards. If you cannot or won’t pay, you are promptly shown out again - .

If you pay,
you can leave possessions and money here to save having to carry them around with you. You can also rest here safely, and recover any Stamina points you have lost. Record in the box anything you wish to leave. When you are ready, you can leave by turning to 633.
